title: Top 10 Selling Crossbody Bags
bodyText: The table below lists the top 10 selling crossbody bags based on sales data. The sales figures represent the total number of units sold for each style-color description. This information can help identify the most popular crossbody bag styles among customers.
tableData:
| style_colour_desc                 |   sales |
|:----------------------------------|--------:|
| Handbag Crossbody bag Style 46648 |     899 |
| Handbag Crossbody bag Style 43477 |     822 |
| Handbag Crossbody bag Style 40077 |     810 |
| Handbag Crossbody bag Style 46672 |     761 |
| Handbag Crossbody bag Style 46724 |     651 |
| Handbag Crossbody bag Style 49873 |     536 |
| Handbag Crossbody bag Style 51977 |     521 |
| Handbag Crossbody bag Style 50173 |     517 |
| Handbag Crossbody bag Style 36694 |     435 |
| Handbag Crossbody bag Style 51990 |     424 |
subhead: The top 10 selling crossbody bags are led by Style 46648 with 899 units sold, followed by Style 43477 and Style 40077.
details: The data was filtered to include only crossbody bags from the 'product_subgroup_desc' column. The sales figures were then summed up for each 'style_colour_desc' and sorted in descending order to identify the top 10 selling styles. The sales figures represent the total number of units sold for each style-color description.
recommendations: Consider increasing the stock levels for the top-selling styles to meet customer demand. Additionally, analyze the features of these popular styles to inform the design and production of future collections.
request_and_response_issues: The data provided does not include information on inventory levels, costs, or margins, which could provide a more comprehensive view of the performance of these styles. Future analysis could benefit from incorporating these additional metrics.
